statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT timestamp, sender_address FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND receiver_address = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE receiver_address='John Doe' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE sender_address='Alice' OR receiver_address='Bob' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE sender_address='Alice' AND receiver_address='Bob';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE sender_address != receiver_address ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE sender_address = '123 Main St'
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND receiver_address LIKE '%@domain.com'
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01'
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM payment_transactions
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT user_id, payment_date, status FROM payments WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = 200 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND status = 'Success' ORDER BY amount ASC;

SELECT p.id, p.payment_date, t.amount, s.settlement_date FROM payments p LEFT JOIN transactions t ON p.id = t.sender_id LEFT JOIN settlements s ON t.id = s.transaction_id WHERE p.amount > 500 AND s.status = 'Settled' ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.sender_id, t.receiver_id, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions t WHERE t.status = 'Completed' GROUP BY t.sender_id, t.receiver_id HAVING COUNT(t.id) > 1 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT p.user_id, t.amount AS transaction_amount, s.settlement_date FROM payments p JOIN transactions t ON p.id = t.sender_id JOIN settlements s ON t.id = s.transaction_id WHERE p.amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 AND t.status = 'Completed' ORDER BY s.settlement_date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT method_name, description FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE 'Credit%';
SELECT * FROM transactions_log WHERE status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 50 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%card%';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, status FROM transactions_log WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE payer_account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment_transactions
SELECT payer_account_id, SUM(amount) FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY payer_account_id
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT payee_account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY payee_account_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT payer_account_id, currency, count(*) AS transaction_count FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY payer_account_id, currency ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE currency = 'USD' AND amount > 1000
